bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, disc only, double butted TT and ORE DT, externally relieved head tube, internally relieved BB shell, reinforced disc mount, forged 3D dropouts w/ replaceable 98954020 hanger

Specialized 3D forged alloy, four bolt, 31.8mm, 7 degree rise
Alloy 31.8mm XC rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back, 6 degree up sweep, 3.0mm thick
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 6" G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid BB5, mechanical disc, 6" G2 Clean Sweep rotor
Shimano HG-73, 1/2" x 3/32" w/ missing link
Shimano FCM-442-8, Octalink Spline, 9-speed, replaceable rings w/ alloy outer
Shimano ES-25, Octalink Spline, cartridge bearing, 68 x 118mm for 50mm chainline
Specialized/Alex RHD 26, double wall disc w/ eyelets
Specialized Hi Lo disc, 32h, CNC flange and disc mount, polished races, alloy QR
Specialized Hi Lo disc cassette, 32h, CNC flange and disc mount, polished races, alloy QR
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
